features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with email/password, profile management, and role-based access control

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main user dashboard with widgets for XP progress, daily rituals, coherence, achievements, current lesson, constellation navigator, teacher feed, and quick actions

features.name: Course System
features.description: Course catalog, course details, course player for video lessons, and course creation for teachers

features.name: Mastery System
features.description: Habit tracking, toolbox items, and calendar integration for mastery progression

features.name: XP and Leveling System
features.description: XP progression system with 51 levels across 4 schools (Ignition, Insight, Transformation, God Mode)

features.name: Skills System
features.description: Track progress across cognitive, creative, discipline, and social skills

features.name: Achievements System
features.description: Display and track user achievements and badges

features.name: Community and Social Features
features.description: Social feed, posts, comments, and community interactions

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile page with settings, progress tracking, and avatar management

features.name: Pricing and Subscription
features.description: Stripe integration for subscription management and payment processing

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with shadcn/ui and Radix UI

features.name: Common Components
features.description: Shared components for loading, errors, and navigation

features.name: Utilities and Helpers
features.description: Utility functions for error handling, logging, memoization, and permissions

features.name: Styling
features.description: Global styles including glassmorphism effects and mobile responsiveness
